channel.title: Any ideas on the ddos?
channel.description:
The server hasn't been accessible for hours, due to a consistent 100+mbit barrage of data filling up the line. It was directed at moparisthebest.com, but as far is I could tell, not any specific ports or anything. So I assume it was a UDP flood or similar. I've stopped the flood by having the host null-route the IP moparisthebest.com is pointing at.
Does anyone have any information about this?

item.title: Any ideas on the ddos?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I believe I have it stopped now. Only time will tell for the next day or so, but now I at least have a backup plan if it happens again.

Read full topic

it was jagex
[/quote]

It was somebody against private servers, Roon Serba was down for 30 minutes today and is going on and off every now and then. Also, Rune-LocuZ was offline for 10 minutes at 2am[/quote]

One of the stupidest statements ever.

Read full topic

item.title: Any ideas on the ddos?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I really don’t think it has anything to do with xx matty xx, attacking a desktop on a home internet connection is one thing. Maintaining a 100mbit+ attack against a dedicated server is another thing entirely.

item.title: Any ideas on the ddos?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The DDos is following the domain name moparisthebest.com, because when I updated it to point at another one of my IPs, the attack resumed. I’m trying to figure out what I can do with this.

Read full topic

[/quote]
xxmattyxx[/quote]Yea

[quote=“xx matty xx”]Are you completely retarded?

HURR DURR SOMEONE IS ATTACKED MY SERVER FOR A FEW SECONDS, MAYBE I SHOULD MAKE THE ATTACKER ANGRY SO HE ATTACKS MORE?

Remove my name.[/quote]

[quote=“xx matty xx”]remove that shit saying it was me or i’ll do a real ddos, using all the servers in the cs department when i get back to uni next week[/quote]It’s next week

I dunno, sounds suspicious.

EDIT - Just realized: the DDOS he did before was the minecraft server, and now that minecraft is hosted on moparisthebest.com…
